snippet: The campaign against increasing the minimum wage illustrates how interest groups — conservative and liberal — are working in opaque ways to shape hot-button political debates.
abstract: Employment Policies Institute, widely quoted economic research institute that has warned against raising minimum wage, is financed by public relations firm representing the restaurant industry; organization highlights web of industry ties underpinning effort to shape hot-button issues; policy groups on both sides of minimum wage battle have similar financial interests, including left-leaning organizations that take donations from labor unions.
lead_paragraph: The campaign against increasing the minimum wage illustrates how interest groups — conservative and liberal — are working in opaque ways to shape hot-button political debates.

headline.main: Fight Over Minimum Wage Illustrates Web of Industry Ties
headline.print_headline: Fight Over Wage Illustrates Web of Industry Ties
